contentfulPagePressRelease.title: Vodafone Partners With Aspire Zone for its Ramadan Festival

childMarkdownRemark.html:
Vodafone Qatar has announced its partnership with Aspire Zone for the upcoming Ramadan in Aspire 2015.

The upcoming Ramadan in Aspire 2015 will bring entertainment for families and everyone from all ages in Qatar with its Ramadan ‘Freej’, its Garangao celebrations, its Dome Walking Competition and plenty of other activities.

The Ramadan in Aspire’s Freej will feature a fanzone for visitors to enjoy all the traditional Qatari sports and games activities. The word ‘Freej’ stands for neighborhood in the GCC region. It usually has courtyard-style houses built connected to each other to keep residents in contact.

The Festival’s Freej will help visitors know more about Qatar’s heritage in a very unique atmosphere that encapsulates the traditions in the Gulf. The Freej will also feature shops, hand-crafts, a story-telling Majlis and food stations and will hold activities aimed specifically at charity.

In addition to the Freej, the Ramadan in Aspire will organize the Dome Walking Competition, an indoor walking competition to encourage people to adopt brisk walking exercise along the corridors of the dome, accessible through the back entrance of Hamad Aquatic.

The Dome will be open daily from 3pm to 5pm and from 8pm to 11pm. With the help of pedometers, visitors walking 10,000 steps a day during Ramadan, for a period of 20 days, will get the chance to win a prize. The top five dome walkers will receive gift vouchers. Every person who walks 20 days or more receives a step into health give-away pack.

Together with the Dome Walking Competition, Aspire will launch a Selfie Competition with one winner a week. Participants simply need to grab a Selfie at the Festival’s Freej and post it with the hashtag #FreejAspire or #AspireSelfie.

Also for photography enthusiasts, Aspire will organize a professional photography competition starting on the first day of the holy month of Ramadan and ending during its last week, Aspire will award 25 winners by using their photos in Aspire’s future campaigns and across social media.

For more information on Ramadan in Aspire 2015, please visit: www.lifeinaspire.qa/ramadan
For the full story, please click here.
